characters.story: Peep hole standard sings "Kway!" cheerfully - spy glimpse situation!
Den hole bend sings "Koo!" cheerfully - cave hollow stone discovery!
Strait hole saw bends down drooping "Jigh" - narrow not wide!
Extract tree strait commands sharply "Jah!" - squeeze press juice!
Poverty-stricken hole monarch bends down drooping "Jyohng" - embarrassed poor distressed!
Poor hole body bends down drooping "Chyohng" - destitute impoverished!
Hollow hole jawbone sings "Woh!" cheerfully - nest den club hideout!
Body cavity flesh empty sings "Chyahng!" cheerfully - chamber accent Taiwan sandhi!
Tired thread rice田 commands sharply "Lay!" - exhausted weary!
Spiral shell insect tired questions "Lwoh? Coiled?" curiously - snail helix!
Yarn thread few sings "Shah!" cheerfully - gauze fabric weave!
Ample thread convex commands sharply "Chwoh!" - spacious nickname!
Acquaint thread call sings "Shao!" cheerfully - introduce present!
"SHOO!" the old man commands sharply, rambling on with long-winded stories about threads - tediously!
"RAO!" the thread commands sharply, winding to go around the spool in circles - detour complete!
"DZAH!" the needle and thread sing cheerfully as she binds the package - tying it securely and solid!
"MYEN?" the white towel and thread question curiously - is this continuous, unbroken cotton fabric?
"HWAY!" the artist commands sharply, using thread-thin brushes to paint and draw illustrations!
